versions.highlight: Headphone Stand: Complete Organic Redesign - Tripod Base + Sculptural Forms

changes.details: 3 curved legs radiating at 120Â° intervals from central hub (48mm dia). Legs taper from 22mm at hub to 16mm at tips, curve down 12mm for stability. 140mm footprint. Column socket (28mm) in hub center. Inspired by fine furniture - flowing curves replace boxy rectangular base.

Organic tapered sleeve (27.5-24mm, 85mm tall) replaces square tube. Press-fits into tripod base socket. Hollow interior (21.5mm) accepts upper column. 4 M3 setscrew holes for height locking (15mm spacing). 3mm wall thickness.

changes.description: Tapered inner column with integrated cradle - new component
changes.details: Organic tapered column (20.9-18mm, 115mm tall) with integrated teardrop cradle at top (75mm wide). Arched top (R85 convex) with R13 concave channel. Integrated spacer hook slot at back (42mm tall) replaces shelf - cleaner design. Slides in lower column with 0.3mm tolerance.
Larger body (145x26x28mm), wider channel (15mm). Fixed pad now 58mm tall with organic rounded edges and gentler R50 concave curve (vs R40). Smoother pad distributes pressure more evenly.
Larger base (22x14.4x17.5mm) and taller pad (58mm vs 50mm). Organic rounded edges with R50 concave curve. Better ergonomics and ear cup contact.

Threaded knob (22mm dia x 8mm) with 16 grip facets screws onto M6 bolt end past captive nut to prevent bolt backout. User taps M6 thread after printing. Addresses user request for bolt stop mechanism. 100% infill for thread strength.
Replaced by organic TripodBase - more stable, elegant, furniture-like aesthetic.
Replaced by ColumnLower + ColumnUpper two-piece design - tapered organic shapes, setscrew height lock (vs slot/tab), integrated spacer hook (vs shelf).

versions.highlight: Headphone Stand: Curved Cradle + Stretcher Vice Tool

changes.details: Replaced flat-top cradle with convex arched surface (R80mm). Large cylinder subtraction from below creates natural arch for headband to rest in. Concave channel cut into arched surface as before.
Screw-driven vice body (140x22x22mm) with U-channel, fixed ear cup pad post (50mm tall, concave R40 face), M6 bolt counterbore + clearance hole, and graduation marks at 5mm intervals.

Sliding jaw (20x13.4x13.5mm base) with 50mm pad post (concave R40 face), captive M6 nut pocket (10.2mm square), and bolt clearance hole. M6 bolt gives 1mm spread per turn for gradual headphone stretching.

versions.highlight: Multi-Project Repository, Headband Spacer & Headphone Stand

changes.description: AirPods Max Headphone Stand - new project
changes.details: Two-piece telescoping headphone stand with adjustable height. Square tube base (130x90mm) with 5 locking slots, slider column with curved headband cradle, locking tab, and spacer holder shelf. Height range 61-161mm in 15mm steps.

changes.description: AirPods Max Headband Spacer - new project
changes.details: Graduated wedge spacer (37-47mm taper over 80mm) that slides between mesh canopy and steel frame to reduce clamping force. Frame rail grooves, 4 graduation notches at 16mm intervals, chamfered leading edge. FreeCAD Python script with full parametric design.

Restructured repo from single-project (Krypton NAS) to multi-project generative 3D prints collection. spec.json now contains a projects array. Each project has its own colors, parameters, components, and assembly data.
export_3mf.py and build.sh now iterate over all projects in spec.json, generating models and exporting STLs to project-specific subdirectories (stl/krypton-nas/, stl/headband-spacer/).

changes.description: Multi-project spec viewer with project tabs
changes.details: spec-viewer.html now shows a project switcher. Each project gets its own 3D viewport, component buttons, color legend, data cards, and print settings. STLs loaded from project subdirectories.
Moved STLs from flat stl/ directory into project subdirectories: stl/krypton-nas/ and stl/headband-spacer/. Updated all references in spec.json, components.json, and pipeline.

changes.description: Updated landing page and README for multi-project repo
changes.details: Dashboard index.html now shows project cards with links to each project's spec viewer. README updated to describe the generative 3D prints collection.
Automated pipeline with .state/spec.json as single source of truth. FreeCAD headless script assigns per-body colors and exports multi-color 3MF plus individual STLs.

Interactive spec sheet with Three.js 3D viewer, exploded view with component selector, orbit controls, color palette legend, engineering data cards, hardware BOM, and print settings. Replaces TechDraw renderer.

changes.description: Master spec file as single source of truth
changes.details: Centralized .state/spec.json with color palette (6 Krypton-themed colors), parametric dimensions, component-to-color mappings, hardware BOM, and assembly instructions.
Completed design specifications for 7 desk accessories: Argo Pedestal, Rao's Halo, Sunstone Shards, Phantom Zone Conduit, House Crest, Kandor Station, and Fortress Crown.
Refactored repository with .state/ JSON files, interactive HTML dashboards, structured documentation, and Claude AI navigation guide.
Superseded by Three.js spec viewer. Deleted render_spec_sheet.py, blueprint_template_a3.svg, and generated SVG/DXF outputs.

changes.description: Separated bare shell from integrated shell
changes.details: MainShell.stl is now the bare hollow shell (no mounts fused). MainShell_Integrated.stl remains available as a single-piece alternative with SSD, Ethernet, and Pi5 mounts fused in.
Removed orphaned files: KryptonNAS_SpecSheet.FCStd, stale __pycache__, Post.html draft, empty directories. Cleaned .gitignore.

changes.description: HDMI port cutouts not rendering correctly
changes.details: Dual micro-HDMI cutouts on LeftPanel_ShieldArray have incorrect geometry or positioning. Boolean cut may be malformed.

versions.highlight: Initial release - Complete Krypton NAS enclosure

changes.details: 140x100mm base, 160mm height, 85% taper. Integrated SSD clamp mount (z=3mm), Ethernet cradle (z=35mm), and Pi 5 posts (z=65mm). 24 magnet recesses for removable panels.
Radial diamond pattern with central focal point and 3 expanding rings. 6 embedded magnet slots.
Hex matrix pattern with crystal slot vents at top and diamond accents at bottom. RJ45 passthrough cutout.
Shield tessellation pattern with cutouts for USB-C power, dual micro-HDMI, and Ethernet jack.
Sinusoidal wave with diamond nodes. Cutouts for USB 3.0, Ethernet adapter, and SSD cable exit.
Rails with 4 snap-in retention clips for UGREEN M.2 enclosure (125x41x14mm). Tool-free installation at z=3mm.
U-cradle with retention clips for UGREEN USB-C adapter (62x25x15mm). Positioned at z=35mm.
4 corner posts matching Pi 5 hole pattern (85x56mm) with M2.5 threaded holes. Airflow platform at z=65mm, board surface at z=73mm.
Vertical tapered tower with hex grid vents, removable side panel (friction fit), peaked lid with chimney exhaust, and Krypton-themed glyphs.
Angular wedge design (200x100mm) with front-to-rear slope. Convection-driven cooling with arrow vents indicating airflow direction.
